Table 3: Accuracy of CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100 under white-box attacks2019), defense (or robust model training) (Madry et al., 2018; Carlini et al., 2019; Tramer et al.,2018) and interpretable adversarial robustness (Schmidt et al., 2018; Tsipras et al., 2018).
